body: Hey guys, I use the Ladybug Radiation Analysis component and I get the radiation results(not the total  result), it is a series of numbers, also the radiation is plotted on the geometry, but how can I find out which result corresponds to which mesh(or which part) of the analysis radiation? Thanks in advance, Best, Zhonghao [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/pEYWotxu2NK5eeA8Yv3turuNqPfk2PhfwZP7AXmKGhH48V-YLPt6*dB0iOOV86uRc8bXl3Fw2IVLqaAL-FQGul6Sd*9lh1UE/result.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/pEYWotxu2NLr2227S3UjhUgl6V7t8tigKVwvShSgC8HzefQBhoy06p-9uJQdSmOXrqV1KBF9BPMxA1cJT28OVVDvCx1OBeuJ/geometry.png)
topic: The relation between radiation results and the geometry
